snippet.title: Frostpunk Console Edition | Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Frostpunk - a grim society-simulator and city-builder and a PC best-seller in one, in which players struggle against the frozen post-apocalyptic landscape as the ruler of the last city on Earth - will be launching on Xbox One and PlayStation 4 on October 11th.

Frostpunk is a society survival game where heat means life and every decision comes at a price. Presenting complex strategic gameplay, demanding challenges and rich story, Frostpunk extends its unmatched survival experience to consoles. Adapted to the new platforms, with revised controls and adjusted mechanics - Frostpunk: Console Edition allows you to fully test your tactical prowess on the frozen wastelands.

More about the game:
http://www.frostpunkgame.com/
https://www.facebook.com/frostpunkgame/
https://twitter.com/frostpunkgame

Frostpunk: Console Edition contains all the previous free updates from the PC version,
including The Fall of Winterhome scenario, additional customization options, difficulty settings,
and balance tweaks. Furthermore, additional content updates are planned for the future
